sources.title: Ritzy Hotel (1932)
sources.description: Krazy Kat encounters many wild events as a bellboy in a large hotel. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ritzy-hotel-1932/

metadata.Plot: For a ritzy hotel, it runs a slapdash operation, with Krazy Kat the sole employee to serve as a bellhop and doorman who gets his head stuck again and again in a spittoon.There are a couple of Prohibition jokes, and a wheelchair-bound guest whose gouty foot Krazy continually torments. The gags come at a furious rate, resulting in a good cartoon that should amuse its audience.
